articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Indiana homeowner charged in fatal shooting of house cleaner who showed up at wrong door - Politico
articles.description: The case tests the limits of stand-your-ground laws.
articles.content:
Andersen shot her through the front door with no warning about a minute after hearing someone trying to unlock the door, according to a probable cause statement.
Rios husband told media outlets that… [+4786 chars]
